tool_description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application
name: Shazam Core
title: Shazam Core

api_list.name: songs/recognize-song
api_list.description: Enough 3-5 seconds of audio, no more than 3 mb. Optimally 500 kb. It is best practice to send in chunks until you find a match. Get details of recognizing track by file. Ex. https://disk.yandex.ru/d/0jCEoQP3hkPDzg https://disk.yandex.ru/d/sepd6XUnhls1aw

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: Audio file. Enough 2-4 seconds of audio, no more than 1 mb. Optimally 500 kb. Only .wav .ogg .mp3 files allowed. Ex. https://disk.yandex.ru/d/0jCEoQP3hkPDzg

utterances.utterance: Identify the song from this audio clip.
Can you recognize this song from the provided audio file?
What song is this? Here's the audio file.
Please identify the track from this short audio snippet.
I have a 3-second audio clip. Can you tell me the song?
Here's an audio file. Can you find out which song it is?
Identify the song from this 4-second audio sample.
What's the name of the song in this audio clip?
Can you recognize this song from the audio file I'm uploading?
Here's a short audio snippet. Can you identify the song?
